parameters.name: attack
parameters.description: Envelope attack time controlling the softness of the note onset.

parameters.name: decay
parameters.description: Envelope decay shaping how quickly the note settles.

parameters.name: sustain
parameters.description: Sustain level as a ratio of the peak amplitude.

parameters.name: release
parameters.description: Envelope release length after a key is released.

parameters.name: vibratoRate
parameters.description: Speed of the natural brass vibrato.

parameters.name: vibratoDepth
parameters.description: Depth of the vibrato pitch modulation.

parameters.name: brightness
parameters.description: Tone brightness blending in additional harmonics.

parameters.name: breath
parameters.description: Amount of breath noise mixed into the tone.

parameters.name: hallMix
parameters.description: Mix amount of the concert hall reverb.
